meta.title: HAWKED - Play for Free on PC, PS5, PS4, and Xbox Series X|S!
meta.description: HAWKED is a free-to-play online Extraction Shooter available on Windows PC, PS4, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. Join the ultimate treasure hunt as you adventure and battle through a mysterious world in pursuit of ancient treasures.
meta.sharing_title: HAWKED - Play for Free on PC, PS5, PS4, and Xbox Series X|S!
meta.sharing_description: HAWKED is a free-to-play online Extraction Shooter available on Windows PC, PS4, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. Join the ultimate treasure hunt as you adventure and battle through a mysterious world in pursuit of ancient treasures.

HOLIDAY
HEIST

rally.text: Time to deck the Riftwake's halls. Tackle new holiday-themed quests to find a festive thief and earn exclusive holiday loot.

twitch-drops.title:
TWITCH
DROPS
twitch-drops.subtitle: TUNE IN, LOOT UP
twitch-drops.text: Watch select HAWKED streams on Twitch to earn special in-game content! Get ready by linking your account with Twitch today.

main.title:
JOIN THE
HUNT!
main.subtitle: WELCOME TO HAWKED
main.text: HAWKED is a free-to-play online Extraction Shooter available on Windows PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. Join the ultimate treasure hunt as you adventure and battle through a mysterious world in pursuit of ancient treasures.

list.title: OUTFOX & OUTGUN!
list.text: Scavenge guns, ammo, and loot to battle vicious Disciples and outwit rival Renegades roaming X-Isle!

list.title: EXPLORE X-ISLE!
list.text: Venture through a mysterious, ever-evolving world of verdant vistas, dense jungles, and ancient ruins!

list.title: LOOT 'EM UP!
list.text: Solve puzzles and defeat enemies to steal Artifacts. Extract and upgrade them to unlock new powers!

subscribe.title: OFFICIAL NEWSLETTER
subscribe.text: Get the edge on rival Renegades with news about updates, events, special offers, and more sent straight to your inbox. Subscribe now to receive a FREE Ace Archaeologist Hat!

intro.title: THE ULTIMATE TREASURE HUNT
intro.text: On a mysterious island, reptilian monsters known as Disciples search for ancient relics of great power. Become a Renegade and fight fire with fire by stealing, extracting, and escaping with Artifacts!

features.title: HUNT & GATHER!
features.text: Scavenge weapons and ammo, upgrade your loadout, unlock special powers and abilities, and wield mystical Artifacts to outfox Disciples and rival Renegades.

features.title: ADAPT & OVERCOME!
features.text: Work smarter, not harder! Solve puzzles, dodge deadly traps, find Glyphs to unlock the Treasury, and hone your treasure-hunting skills to score the best loot.

features.title: EXPLORE & ADVENTURE!
features.text: Be a part of the story as it unfolds in special events and Issues. Look out for new locations, enemies, rewards, treasure, and much more in regular updates.

extraction.title: COLLECT GLYPHS!
extraction.text: Complete encounters across X-Isle to obtain Glyphs. Collect five to reveal the Treasury's location!

extraction.title: UNLOCK THE TREASURY!
extraction.text: Shoot Glyphs in the correct order on the Treasury door to reveal and claim the Artifact within.

extraction.title: EXTRACT THE ARTIFACT!
extraction.text: Return the Artifact to the Riftwake via Extraction Points found across X-Isle. Upgrade it to wield its power!

info.title: A mysterious world awaits
info.text: This mystical, storm-ridden island was home to a long-lost human civilization. It's covered with temples, treasure, and boundless opportunity, so explore its secrets and get looting!

garrharbor.name: GARRHARBOR
garrharbor.text: A coastal region where Disciples gather to scavenge shipwrecks lost to the storm. It's also the island's main fishing outpost (pro tip: hold your nose).

cursed_tombs.name: CURSED TOMBS
cursed_tombs.text: A hallowed location where fallen Disciple warriors are brought to 'return to the island' in a resurrection ritual so they can fight another day.

feeding_grounds.name: FEEDING GROUNDS
feeding_grounds.text: X-Isle's central nexus, a sacred place to both Disciples and the ancient civilization. Artifacts gain their potent magic after being forged in its great pit... but what lurks at the bottom?

river_village.name: RIVER VILLAGE
river_village.text: Once a bustling trade hub for the island’s previous inhabitants, this ramshackle village is now a den of despicable Disciple depravity.

beacon.name: THE BEACON
beacon.text: Let the light guide you. An imposing construction created by the lost civilization, rumored to have a connection to the supernatural storm that envelops X-Isle.

raiding_portal.name: RAIDING PORTAL
raiding_portal.text: One of the Disciples' attempts to extend their scaly grasp into the wider world of humankind. It's not operational... for now.

training_halls.name: TRAINING HALLS
training_halls.text: Disciples battle in this arena to ascend their reptilian ranks. Once a place of fellowship, it has been remade to fit the Disciples’ primal wants and needs.

mountain_temple.name: MOUNTAIN TEMPLE
mountain_temple.text: Sages of the lost civilization used to commune with the energy of the island here through mystic practice and music. Now, the Disciples' magic users hone their craft here.

marsh_hollow.name: MARSH HOLLOW
marsh_hollow.text: These wetlands form the backdrop to a temple carved into a mighty cliff face. The ancient construct pierces the sky above and sinks into the Artifact-strewn marshes below.

info.title: Welcome to GRAIL's sub-aquatic headquarters.
info.text: Massive in size and able to withstand the treacherous waters around X-Isle, it's home to GRAIL's finest treasure hunters for hire.

bodhi_hogan.name: BODHI HOGAN
bodhi_hogan.text: A thrill-seeking Renegade at the very top of his treasure-hunting game. He's got your back, until you become the competition.

bjorn_bjornsson.name: DR. BJORN BJORNSSON
bjorn_bjornsson.text: A Renegade scientist specialized in geology and volcanology, and a living tome of speculative knowledge about X-Isle.

nellie_ruffin.name: NELLIE RUFFIN
nellie_ruffin.text: Years of running riot through the Disciples' ranks have made this Renegade the foremost expert on how to hit the horde where it hurts.

agent_cynthia.name: AGENT CYNTHIA
agent_cynthia.text: Serving GRAIL as the Renegade handler aboard the Riftwake, this agent knows how to get results out of her merry band of bandits.

ge_0.name: GE-0
ge_0.text: GRAIL's robotic quartermaster stationed aboard the Riftwake. Its primary function is to collect looted Artifacts from Renegades and offer wares in return.

not_auth.title:
Get a free gift
in 3 clicks!
not_auth.text: Log in or register to subscribe to the official HAWKED newsletter, and claim your FREE Ace Archaeologist Hat in 3 clicks!

form.title:
Get a free gift
in 2 clicks!
form.text: You're logged in with an account linked to the following email address:
form.agreements: I would like to receive latest news, tailored marketing communications, and special offers from HAWKED via email.

send.title:
Get a free gift
in 1 click!
send.text: Confirmation email sent to: {email}. Don't forget to check your spam folder if you can't find the email in your inbox.
send.cant_resend: For security measures, you need to wait 10 minutes before sending another confirmation email. If this problem persists, please contact our Support team.

success.title:
You're subscribed
to HAWKED!
success.text: Congratulations on becoming a subscriber! Your free Ace Archaeologist Hat will be available in-game soon. Keep an eye on your inbox for the latest from HAWKED!

news.title: ALL THE LATEST NEWS
news.text: Stay in the loop with information about the latest HAWKED updates, events, and more delivered straight to your inbox.

offers.title: SPECIAL OFFERS
offers.text: On the hunt for a bargain? Receive notifications about new sales and discounts in-game, plus deals exclusive to subscribers.

benefits.title: EXCLUSIVE BENEFITS
benefits.text: For your eyes only. As a subscriber, you can receive tailored communications and free gifts to help take your game to the next level.

news.no_news: There is currently no news in this category. Check back later for updates!

press.title: PRESS KIT
text: Are you a content creator or journalist interested in covering HAWKED?
Download the Press Kit to get assets and game information, or get in touch via press{'@'}my.games for further inquiries.

noauth.text: Welcome to your Account! Here you can log in or register to access your details, check your Player ID, link your game account to new platforms, and reset your password.

not_auth.title: CONNECT YOUR GAME ACCOUNT:
not_auth.note: Choose and log in via the platform account you play HAWKED on. If you're unable to log in, make sure pop-ups are enabled.

connect.note: Click the button to complete the linking process with Twitch.

stream.note: IMPORTANT: Only one HAWKED account may be linked with a single Twitch account. To change your linked account, visit Twitch and disconnect HAWKED from "Other Connections" in your account settings.

errors.text: SOMETHING WENT WRONG. TRY RELOADING THE PAGE.

features.title: 1. LINK YOUR ACCOUNTS
features.text: Follow the steps on this page to link your Twitch account with the HAWKED account you want to claim Twitch Drops for.

features.title: 2. TUNE IN
features.text: Watch HAWKED streams on Twitch hosted by Drop-enabled Content Creators.

features.title: 3. CLAIM REWARDS!
features.text: Rack up enough viewing time, claim items from your Twitch Drops Inventory, and receive them in-game!

top_up.title: GE-0 CASH

intro.subtitle: PREMIUM CURRENCY
intro.description: Got your eye on something shiny? Buy GE-0 Cash to spend on the current Renegade Pass, cosmetic items like Outfits and Emotes, and more in-game!

success.title: PAYMENT SUCCESSFUL!
success.message: Your GE-0 Cash will be available in-game within the next 15 minutes. Have fun, Renegade!

packs.title:
RAIDER
PACKS
packs.subtitle: LOOT UP!
packs.text: Raider Packs are special bundles stuffed to the brim with in-game content, including currency, consumables, and exclusive cosmetics.

shard_error.title: PURCHASES CANNOT BE COMPLETED AT THIS TIME. PLEASE TRY AGAIN LATER.

character_error.title: IMPORTANT!
character_error.body: Before making a purchase, you must play HAWKED at least once.

top_up.alarm_disclaimer: Upon checkout, you agree that the digital content will be available to you immediately, and you consent and acknowledge that, consequently, you waive your automatic statutory right of withdrawal, except if the digital content is defective.

top-up.title: THANKS FOR YOUR PURCHASE!
top-up.text: You will receive an email from Steam confirming your purchase. Your new items will be available in-game soon!

fail.title: SOMETHING WENT WRONG
fail.text: Your order was unsuccessful due to a payment error. Please try again or contact Steam Support for assistance.

steam.warning: We are opening your Steam Wallet in a browser pop-up in order to proceed with your purchase. If you are reading this, then you have either already made your payment (thank you!), or this pop-up has not opened correctly. Check the notification in your browser's address bar or notification area and allow our page to open this popup. Alternatively, use this {link_html}.

about.title: STEP INTO ADVENTURE!
about.text: HAWKED is a free online PvPvE extraction shooter coming soon to consoles and Windows PC. Squad up with pals to explore a mysterious island, battle monsters, and outwit enemy players to steal ancient treasures... then get the hell outta there!

promocode.title: REDEEM YOUR CODE

noauth.text: You don't have to visit X-Isle to find treasure. Log in to redeem promo codes and unlock special content in HAWKED!

promocode.code_success_text: Your items are waiting for you in-game

trophy_hunter.name: Trophy Hunter
trophy_hunter.description: Put enemies in your crosshairs with this hunter's skin for your Assault Rifle.

saurian_spoils.name: Saurian Spoils
saurian_spoils.description: An ominous Disciple-themed accessory for your Renegade.

predator.name: Predator
predator.description: Stalk your prey on this leathery Hoverboard.

rended_claws.name: Rended Claws
rended_claws.description: Wield these mystical talons pried from a fierce foe.

grave_relic.name: Grave Relic
grave_relic.description: Deliver some doom upon your decor.

scaly_stash.name: Scaly Stash
scaly_stash.description: Keep things safe, sound, and scaly.

disciple_hunter.name: Disciple Hunter
disciple_hunter.description: Hunt your quarry to the ends of X-Isle.

shimmering_scales.name: Shimmering Scales
shimmering_scales.description: Customize your Outfit and shine as bright as you fight.

renegade_pass.name: Renegade Pass
renegade_pass.description: Unlocks access to an Issue's Premium rewards track.

cash.name: GE-0 CASH
cash.description: A premium currency to spend on in-game cosmetic items and more.

grail_subscription.name: GRAIL + Subscription
grail_subscription.description: A premium subscription that grants bonus XP and match rewards.

top_up_banner.title: GE-0 CASH
top_up_banner.subtitle: PREMIUM CURRENCY
top_up_banner.text: Top up your Renegade coffers with GE-0 Cash, an in-game currency you can spend on the Renegade Pass, cosmetics like Outfits, Weapon Patterns, Emotes, and more.

intro.title: RAIDER PACKS
intro.subtitle: LOOT UP!
intro.text: Raider Packs are special bundles stuffed to the brim with in-game content, including currency, consumables, and exclusive cosmetics.

payment.success_message: Your new items will be available in-game within the next 15 minutes. Enjoy your Raider Pack!

intro.title:
RENEGADE
RALLY
intro.subtitle: RALLY FOR REWARDS!
intro.text: GRAIL needs more boots on the ground... but we require your assistance. Spread the word, rally the Renegades, and help reach GRAIL's goals to get exclusive in-game rewards!

subscription.name: 7-DAY GRAIL+ SUBSCRIPTION
subscription.text: GRAIL+ is a subscription that lets you maximize your looting with a 20% Experience boost, daily perks, one additional Lockbox Slot, one weekly Quest, and two daily Quests while active.

token_souvenir.name: GRAIL TOKEN SOUVENIR
token_souvenir.text: A symbol of exclusive membership in the world's most renowned treasure-hunting organization.

dryad_color_scheme.name: DRYAD COLOR SCHEME
dryad_color_scheme.text: Become one with the forest. Use this Color Scheme to customize your Renegade style!

forest_weapon_pattern.name: FOREST GUARDIAN WEAPON PATTERN
forest_weapon_pattern.text: Defend the natural world with this Weapon Pattern to spruce up your loadout.

chloris_bloom_traverser.name: CHLORIS BLOOM TRAVERSER
chloris_bloom_traverser.text: Adventure is in bloom. Wield this Traverser as you make a name for yourself on X-Isle!

ruby_pack.name: RUBY RAIDER PACK (50 PRIZES)
ruby_pack.text: Uncover the hidden treasures of X-Isle with the Ruby Raider Pack. Includes a new Weapon Skin, Backpack, Hoverboard, and Traverser!

amethyst_pack.name: AMETHYST RAIDER PACK (30 PRIZES)
amethyst_pack.text: Let the legend of the Disciple Hunter rise with the Amethyst Raider Pack. Includes fearsome Renegade Outfits, gear, currency, and much more!

diamond_pack.name: DIAMOND RAIDER PACK (20 PRIZES)
diamond_pack.text: Discover the most secret, arcane treasures of X-Isle with the Diamond Raider Pack. Includes a Renegade Pass, exclusive Color Scheme, Oufits, gear, currency, and much more!

ge_0_cash.name: LIFETIME SUPPLY OF GE-0 CASH (1 PRIZE)
ge_0_cash.text: GE-0 Cash is an in-game currency you can spend in HAWKED to purchase the current Renegade Pass, plus cosmetic items like Outfits, Weapon Patterns, Emotes, and more! For more details, check the FAQ.

info.title: We want you to join the renegades!
text: Things are heating up on X-Isle, and GRAIL needs boots on the ground to help unravel the island's mysteries... and claim its treasures. Join the Renegade Rally to help recruit new Renegades, push for collective rewards, and for the chance to win prizes from the Renegade Raffle!

Taking part is simple. Sign up for a HAWKED account to join the Renegade Rally, and you'll start receiving exclusive in-game rewards once a certain number of players have signed up. Follow HAWKED's official social channels to earn Raffle Tickets—redeem them for the chance to win Raider Packs and a lifetime supply of GE-0 Cash! 101 prizes are up for grabs, so make sure you're in it to win it.
What are you waiting for? Hop to it and start rallying, Renegade!

sharing.title: SUCCESS!
sharing.text: Get ready to Rally! Follow HAWKED on social media to receive more Raffle Tickets.

sharing_all.title: TA-DAH!
sharing_all.text: All Renegade Rally bonuses have been received. Keep up the good work, Renegade!

action_end.title: RENEGADES RALLIED
action_end.text: Thanks for joining the Renegade Rally! That's all for now, but follow HAWKED on social media to stay on top of the latest news, updates, and exciting events.
